title: How to write a killer script for a short movie - Quora

response.answer_text: Things you will need to write a killer script: Pen.Paper.A killer.All kidding aside though, what you will need is patience. An idea for a script might pop into your head within seconds. You know this will work. You have it all figured out. You have seen the story in your head. Now, you have to start seeing it on a screen. Write it all down, one by one, screen by screen, frame by frame (if you are that kind of a writer). Waiting for your next big release. Cheers!
